awe6.core.drivers.AKernel

type
class
extends
awe6.core.Process
implements
awe6.interfaces.IKernel
The AKernel class provides a minimalist implementation of the IKernel interface.

It is intended as an abstract class to be extended by target specific drivers.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Constructor

new(p_factory : awe6.interfaces.IFactory, p_context : awe6.core.Context)
